reviews.content: Statusbar Color has a Bug. On first opening the text is black on black, return to Homescreen and back to App the Text ist white on black. Systemsettings, Messages, Photo App >> all the same !!! Crazy Bug ?
completely broken. what is wrong with this developer
Status bar disappears when using apps like Facebook and such.
Can’t view app list, therefore can’t enable the tweak in any apps
